thread.title: Re: Will Duterte show up at Edsa commemorative rites?
thread.title_full: Re: Will Duterte show up at Edsa commemorative rites?

author: Hey_Dudes
title: Re: Will Duterte show up at Edsa commemorative rites?
text:
12:32   President Rodrigo Duterte. AP FILE PHOTO 
There is still no confirmation if President Duterte will show up at this year’s commemoration of the 31st anniversary of the Edsa People Power Revolution, where he is supposed to deliver the keynote speech. 
The Malacañang-led event will be held on Feb. 24, instead of Feb. 25, and inside Camp Aguinaldo, instead of the Edsa People Power Monument, so as not to disrupt traffic, according to Menardo Guevarra, senior deputy executive secretary. 
This will be the first Edsa commemoration after Mr. Duterte allowed the burial of dictator Ferdinand Marcos at Libingan ng mga Bayani in Taguig City. ADVERTISEMENT 
Guevarra said this year’s event would be “sober, simple, no fanfare,” but this did not mean that it would be any less significant.
